MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken GetSecurityToken() cil managed

summary.span: Obtiene el token de seguridad representado por la instancia actual.

span.span: Gets the security token that is represented by the current instance.

returns.span: Token de seguridad que representa la instancia actual.

span.span: The security token that the current instance represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si la instancia actual no se crea explícitamente desde una objeto utilizando el constructor, el método se llama para devolver el token de seguridad.If the current instance was not constructed explicitly from a object by using the constructor, then the method is called to return the security token.
